Title: Sora Iro Hana Iro
Description: ['A woman and a dog go on a spiritual journey and undergo a spiritual transformation while wandering in a forest side-by-side.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Sora Iro Hana Iro, ' is not a straight-forward narrative story, but rather series of subjective impressions to tell us more about the state of mind of the female protagonist.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Nishikata Film Review) ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ']
